javascript:%22use%20strict%22%3B(()%3D%3E%7Bvar%20w%3Dclass%7BgetCurrentThreadTime(e%2Ct)%7Blet%20s%3DMath.max(0%2Ct-e.executionStartMs)*e.speedMultiplier%3Bif(e.baselineThreadTime)return%20new%20Date(e.baselineThreadTime.getTime()%2Bs)%3Blet%20i%3De.threadStartTime.getTime()%2Bs%3Breturn%20new%20Date(i)%7DfindPreviousResponse(e%2Ct)%7Bif(e.length%3D%3D%3D0)return%20null%3Blet%20n%3Dt.getTime()%2Cs%3D%5B...e%5D.sort((l%2Cd)%3D%3E%7Blet%20u%3Dl.timestamp.getTime()-d.timestamp.getTime()%3Breturn%20u!%3D%3D0%3Fu%3Al.index-d.index%7D)%2Ci%3D0%2Ca%3Ds.length-1%2Co%3D-1%3Bfor(%3Bi%3C%3Da%3B)%7Blet%20l%3DMath.floor((i%2Ba)%2F2)%3Bs%5Bl%5D.timestamp.getTime()%3C%3Dn%3F(o%3Dl%2Ci%3Dl%2B1)%3Aa%3Dl-1%7Dreturn%20o%3D%3D%3D-1%3Fnull%3As%5Bo%5D%7D%7D%3Bvar%20le%3D%2F%5E(%5Cd%7B2%7D)%5C%2F(%5Cd%7B2%7D)%5C%2F(%5Cd%7B2%7D)%5C((.)%5C)(%5Cd%7B2%7D)%3A(%5Cd%7B2%7D)%3A(%5Cd%7B2%7D)%24%2F%2Cde%3D%2F%5E(%5Cd%7B4%7D)%5C%2F(%5Cd%7B2%7D)%5C%2F(%5Cd%7B2%7D)%20(%5Cd%7B2%7D)%3A(%5Cd%7B2%7D)%3A(%5Cd%7B2%7D)%24%2F%2Cue%3D%5B%22%E6%97%A5%22%2C%22%E6%9C%88%22%2C%22%E7%81%AB%22%2C%22%E6%B0%B4%22%2C%22%E6%9C%A8%22%2C%22%E9%87%91%22%2C%22%E5%9C%9F%22%5D%3Bfunction%20b(r%2Ce%3D%7B%7D)%7Blet%20t%3Dr.trim()%2Cn%3Dt.match(le)%3Bif(n)%7Blet%5B%2Ci%2Ca%2Co%2Cl%2Cd%2Cu%2Ch%5D%3Dn%2Cc%3D2e3%2BNumber.parseInt(i%2C10)%3Breturn%20%24(c%2CNumber.parseInt(a%2C10)-1%2CNumber.parseInt(o%2C10)%2CNumber.parseInt(d%2C10)%2CNumber.parseInt(u%2C10)%2CNumber.parseInt(h%2C10)%2Ce.skipWeekdayCheck%3Fnull%3Al)%7Dlet%20s%3Dt.match(de)%3Bif(s)%7Blet%5B%2Ci%2Ca%2Co%2Cl%2Cd%2Cu%5D%3Ds%3Breturn%20%24(Number.parseInt(i%2C10)%2CNumber.parseInt(a%2C10)-1%2CNumber.parseInt(o%2C10)%2CNumber.parseInt(l%2C10)%2CNumber.parseInt(d%2C10)%2CNumber.parseInt(u%2C10))%7Dreturn%20null%7Dfunction%20%24(r%2Ce%2Ct%2Cn%2Cs%2Ci%2Ca%3Dnull)%7Bif(Number.isNaN(r)%7C%7CNumber.isNaN(e)%7C%7CNumber.isNaN(t)%7C%7CNumber.isNaN(n)%7C%7CNumber.isNaN(s)%7C%7CNumber.isNaN(i))return%20null%3Blet%20o%3Dnew%20Date(r%2Ce%2Ct%2Cn%2Cs%2Ci%2C0)%3Breturn%20o.getFullYear()!%3D%3Dr%7C%7Co.getMonth()!%3D%3De%7C%7Co.getDate()!%3D%3Dt%7C%7Co.getHours()!%3D%3Dn%7C%7Co.getMinutes()!%3D%3Ds%7C%7Co.getSeconds()!%3D%3Di%7C%7Ca%26%26ue%5Bo.getDay()%5D!%3D%3Da%3Fnull%3Ao%7Dfunction%20U(r)%7Blet%20e%3D5381%3Bfor(let%20t%3D0%3Bt%3Cr.length%3Bt%2B%2B)e%3De*33%5Er.charCodeAt(t)%3Breturn(e%3E%3E%3E0).toString(36)%7Dfunction%20G(r%2Ce)%7Blet%20t%3Dr.textContent%7C%7C%22%22%2Cs%3D%60%24%7Be.toISOString()%7D%3A%24%7Bt.substring(0%2C200)%7D%60%3Breturn%20U(s)%7Dvar%20z%3D%7BthreadContainer%3A%22body%20.thre%22%2CresponseTimestamp%3A%22body%20%3E%20div.thre%20table%20.cnw%22%7D%3Bfunction%20T(r)%7Breturn%20r%26%26r.nodeType%3D%3D%3DNode.ELEMENT_NODE%3Fr%3Anull%7Dfunction%20ce(r)%7Blet%20e%3DT(r)%3Breturn%20e%3Fe.tagName%3D%3D%3D%22TABLE%22%3F!0%3Ae.tagName%3D%3D%3D%22DIV%22%26%26e.querySelector(%22table%22)!%3D%3Dnull%3A!1%7Dfunction%20Y(r)%7Breturn%20f(r%2C%22.cnw%22)!%3D%3Dnull%26%26f(r%2C%22.cno%22)!%3D%3Dnull%7Dfunction%20f(r%2Ce)%7Bfor(let%20t%20of%20r)%7Blet%20n%3DT(t)%3Bif(!n)continue%3Bif(n.matches(e))return%20n%3Blet%20s%3Dn.querySelector(e)%3Bif(s)return%20s%7Dreturn%20null%7Dfunction%20v(r)%7Blet%20e%3D%5B%5D%2Ct%3D%5B%5D%2Cn%3D()%3D%3E%7Bt.length!%3D%3D0%26%26(Y(t)%26%26e.push(t)%2Ct%3D%5B%5D)%7D%3Breturn%20r.childNodes.forEach(s%3D%3E%7Bif(ce(s))%7Bn()%2CY(%5Bs%5D)%26%26e.push(%5Bs%5D)%3Breturn%7Dt.push(s)%7D)%2Cn()%2Ce%7Dfunction%20N(r%2Ce%3Ddocument)%7Breturn%20r.map(t%3D%3Ee.importNode(t%2C!0))%7Dfunction%20L(r)%7Blet%20e%3DT(r.querySelector(z.threadContainer))%3Bif(e)return%20e%3Blet%20t%3DT(r.querySelector(%22.thre%22))%3Bif(t)return%20t%3Blet%20n%3DT(r.querySelector(%22%5Bdata-res%5D%22))%3Bif(n)return%20n%3Blet%20s%3DT(r.querySelector(%22.cnw%22))%3Bif(s)%7Blet%20i%3DT(s.closest(%22.thre%22))%3Bif(i)return%20i%3Blet%20a%3DT(s.closest(%22body%20%3E%20div%22))%3Bif(a)return%20a%7Dreturn%20T(r.body)%7Dfunction%20I(r%3Ddocument)%7Blet%20e%3DL(r)%3Bif(!e)return%20console.warn(%22%E3%82%B9%E3%83%AC%E3%83%83%E3%83%89%E3%82%B3%E3%83%B3%E3% (e)%7Bthis.options.onError(e%20instanceof%20Error%3Fe%3Anew%20Error(%22Failed%20to%20capture%20initial%20responses%22))%3Breturn%7Dthis.intervalId%3Dwindow.setInterval(()%3D%3Ethis.update()%2Cthis.options.intervalMs)%7Dstop()%7Bthis.intervalId!%3D%3Dnull%26%26(window.clearInterval(this.intervalId)%2Cthis.intervalId%3Dnull)%7DisRunning()%7Breturn%20this.intervalId!%3D%3Dnull%7DgetCurrentResponses()%7Breturn%5B...this.currentResponses%5D%7Dupdate()%7Btry%7Blet%20e%3DI()%2Ct%3Dthis.detectAddedResponses(this.currentResponses%2Ce)%3Bthis.currentResponses%3De%2Ct.length%3E0%26%26this.options.onResponsesAdded(t)%7Dcatch(e)%7Bthis.options.onError(e%20instanceof%20Error%3Fe%3Anew%20Error(%22Failed%20to%20update%20responses%22))%7D%7DdetectAddedResponses(e%2Ct)%7Bif(t.length%3C%3De.length)return%5B%5D%3Blet%20n%3DMath.min(ge%2Ce.length)%2Cs%3Dnew%20Set(e.slice(-n).map(d%3D%3Ethis.makeIdentifier(d)))%2Ci%3DMath.max(0%2Ce.length-n)%2Ca%3Dt.slice(i)%2Co%3D-1%3Bfor(let%20d%3D0%3Bd%3Ca.length%3Bd%2B%2B)%7Blet%20u%3Dthis.makeIdentifier(a%5Bd%5D)%3Bif(!s.has(u))%7Bo%3Di%2Bd%3Bbreak%7D%7Dif(o%3D%3D%3D-1%7C%7Co%3E%3Dt.length)return%20t.slice(e.length)%3Blet%20l%3DMath.max(o%2Ce.length)%3Breturn%20t.slice(l)%7DmakeIdentifier(e)%7Breturn%60%24%7Be.timestamp.getTime()%7D-%24%7Be.contentHash%7D%60%7D%7D%3Bfunction%20q(r)%7Bif(!r)return%22utf-8%22%3Blet%20e%3Dr.trim().toLowerCase()%3Breturn%20e%3D%3D%3D%22shift_jis%22%7C%7Ce%3D%3D%3D%22shift-jis%22%7C%7Ce%3D%3D%3D%22x-sjis%22%7C%7Ce%3D%3D%3D%22x-shift-jis%22%7C%7Ce%3D%3D%3D%22windows-31j%22%3F%22shift_jis%22%3Ae%7C%7C%22utf-8%22%7Dfunction%20Te(r)%7Blet%20e%3Dr.match(%2F%3Cmeta%5B%5E%3E%5D%2Bcharset%3D%5B%22'%5D%3F(%5B%5E%22'%3E%5Cs%5D%2B)%2Fi)%3Breturn%20e%3F.%5B1%5D%3Fe%5B1%5D%3Ar.match(%2F%3Cmeta%5B%5E%3E%5D%2Bhttp-equiv%3D%5B%22'%5D%3Fcontent-type%5B%22'%5D%3F%5B%5E%3E%5D*content%3D%5B%22'%5D%5B%5E%22'%5D*charset%3D(%5B%5E%22'%3E%5Cs%5D%2B)%2Fi)%3F.%5B1%5D%3F%3Fnull%7Dfunction%20ve(r%2Ce)%7Blet%20t%3De%3F.match(%2Fcharset%3D(%5B%5E%3B%5D%2B)%2Fi)%3F.%5B1%5D%3F%3Fnull%3Bif(t)return%20q(t)%3Blet%20n%3DMath.min(r.byteLength%2C4096)%2Cs%3Dnew%20TextDecoder(%22utf-8%22%2C%7Bfatal%3A!1%7D).decode(new%20Uint8Array(r%2C0%2Cn))%2Ci%3DTe(s)%3Breturn%20i%3Fq(i)%3A%22utf-8%22%7Dasync%20function%20W(r)%7Blet%20e%3Dawait%20fetch(r)%3Bif(!e.ok)throw%20new%20Error(%60%E3%82%B9%E3%83%AC%E3%83%83%E3%83%89%20%24%7Br%7D%20%E3%82%92%E5%8F%96%E5%BE%97%E3%81%A7%E3%81%8D%E3%81%BE%E3%81%9B%E3%82%93%E3%81%A7%E3%81%97%E3%81%9F%20(status%3A%20%24%7Be.status%7D)%60)%3Blet%20t%3Dawait%20e.arrayBuffer()%2Cn%3Dve(t%2Ce.headers.get(%22content-type%22))%2Cs%3Btry%7Bs%3Dnew%20TextDecoder(n).decode(t)%7Dcatch%7Bs%3Dnew%20TextDecoder(%22utf-8%22).decode(t)%7Dreturn%20new%20DOMParser().parseFromString(s%2C%22text%2Fhtml%22)%7Dfunction%20Z(r)%7Breturn(r.querySelector(%22title%22)%3F.textContent%3F%3F%22%22).toLowerCase().includes(%22futafuta%22)%3F%22futafuta%22%3AArray.from(r.querySelectorAll(%22script%5Bsrc%5D%22)).some(i%3D%3Ei.getAttribute(%22src%22)%3F.includes(%22tsumanne.net%22))%7C%7CArray.from(r.querySelectorAll(%22.cnw%22)).some(i%3D%3Ei.textContent%3F.includes(%22ID%3A%22))%3F%22tsumanne%22%3Ar.querySelector(%22.thre%20%3E%20div%20%3E%20table%22)%3F%22futaclo%22%3A%22futaba%22%7Dfunction%20X(r%2Ce)%7Bswitch(e)%7Bcase%22futaba%22%3Areturn%20Ee(r)%3Bcase%22futaclo%22%3Areturn%20xe(r)%3Bcase%22tsumanne%22%3Areturn%20Se(r)%3Bcase%22futafuta%22%3Areturn%20be(r)%3Bdefault%3Areturn%5B%5D%7D%7Dfunction%20Ee(r)%7Blet%20e%3Dr.querySelector(%22.thre%22)%3Breturn%20e%3Fv(e).map(n%3D%3EN(n))%3A%5B%5D%7Dfunction%20xe(r)%7Blet%20e%3Dr.querySelector(%22.thre%22)%3Breturn%20e%3Fv(e).map(n%3D%3EN(n))%3A%5B%5D%7Dfunction%20Se(r)%7Blet%20e%3Dr.querySelector(%22.thre%22)%3Breturn%20e%3Fv(e).filter(s%3D%3E%7Blet%20i%3Ds.find(a%3D%3Ea%20instanceof%20HTMLElement%26%26a.tagName%3D%3D%3D%22TABLE%22)%3Breturn!(i%20instanceof%20HTMLElement%26%26i.classList.contains(%22deleted%22))%7D).map(s%3D%3E%7Blet%20i%3DN(s)%3Breturn%20i.forEach(a%3D%3E%7Ba%20ins o.nodes%2Cd%2C!0)%3Breturn%7Di%2B%3D1%2CK(o.nodes%2Ci)%7D)%3Blet%20a%3Ds.flatMap(o%3D%3Eo.nodes)%3Be.replaceChildren(...a)%7Dfunction%20j(r)%7Blet%20n%3D(f(r%2C%22.cno%22)%3F.textContent%3F%3F%22%22).match(%2FNo%5C.(%5Cd%2B)%2F)%3Bif(!n)return%20null%3Blet%20s%3DNumber.parseInt(n%5B1%5D%2C10)%3Breturn%20Number.isNaN(s)%3Fnull%3As%7Dfunction%20Re(r)%7Blet%20e%3Df(r%2C%22.res_no%22)%3Bif(!e)return%20null%3Blet%20t%3De.textContent%3F%3F%22%22%2Cn%3DNumber.parseInt(t%2C10)%3Breturn%20Number.isNaN(n)%3Fnull%3An%7Dfunction%20we(r)%7Blet%20e%3Df(r%2C%22.rsc%22)%3Bif(!e)return%20null%3Blet%20t%3De.textContent%3F%3F%22%22%2Cn%3DNumber.parseInt(t%2C10)%3Breturn%20Number.isNaN(n)%3Fnull%3An%7Dfunction%20K(r%2Ce%2Ct%3D!1)%7Blet%20n%3Ddocument.createElement(%22span%22)%3Bn.className%3D%22res_no%22%2Cn.textContent%3DString(e)%2Ct%26%26(n.style.display%3D%22none%22)%3Blet%20s%3Df(r%2C%22.rtd%22)%3Bif(s)%7Bs.insertBefore(n%2Cs.firstChild)%3Breturn%7Dlet%20i%3Df(r%2C%22.cnw%22)%3F%3Ff(r%2C%22.cno%22)%3Bif(i%26%26i.parentElement)%7Bi.parentElement.insertBefore(n%2Ci)%3Breturn%7Dif(r.length%3E0%26%26r%5B0%5Dinstanceof%20Element)%7Br%5B0%5D.insertBefore(n%2Cr%5B0%5D.firstChild)%3Breturn%7Dif(r.length%3E0%26%26r%5B0%5D.nodeType%3D%3D%3DNode.TEXT_NODE)%7Br.splice(1%2C0%2Cn)%3Breturn%7Dr.unshift(n)%7Dfunction%20A(r%2Ce)%7Bif(r.startMode%3D%3D%3D%22index%22)%7Blet%20s%3Dr.startResponseIndex%3Bif(!Number.isInteger(s)%7C%7Cs%3C0)return%20E(%7Btype%3A%22index_out_of_range%22%2Cmessage%3A%60%E3%83%AC%E3%82%B9%E7%95%AA%E5%8F%B7%E3%81%8C%E7%AF%84%E5%9B%B2%E5%A4%96%E3%81%A7%E3%81%99%EF%BC%880%E3%80%9C%24%7BMath.max(e.length-1%2C0)%7D%EF%BC%89%60%2CvalidRange%3A%7Bmin%3A0%2Cmax%3AMath.max(e.length-1%2C0)%7D%7D)%3Blet%20i%3De.find(o%3D%3E%7Blet%20l%3DCe(o)%3Breturn%20l!%3D%3Dnull%26%26l%3D%3D%3Ds%7D)%3Bif(i)return%20D(i.timestamp)%3Bif(s%3E%3De.length)return%20E(%7Btype%3A%22index_out_of_range%22%2Cmessage%3A%60%E3%83%AC%E3%82%B9%E7%95%AA%E5%8F%B7%E3%81%8C%E7%AF%84%E5%9B%B2%E5%A4%96%E3%81%A7%E3%81% r(%22.cno%22)%3F.textContent%3F.trim()%3Bif(e)return%20e%3Bif(!r.allNodes)return%20null%3Bfor(let%20t%20of%20r.allNodes)if(t.nodeType%3D%3D%3DNode.ELEMENT_NODE)%7Blet%20n%3Dt%3Bif(n.classList.contains(%22cno%22))return%20n.textContent%3F.trim()%3F%3Fnull%3Blet%20s%3Dn.querySelector(%22.cno%22)%3Bif(s%3F.textContent)return%20s.textContent.trim()%7Dreturn%20null%7Dfunction%20Q(r)%7Bif(typeof%20r%3D%3D%22number%22)return%20Number.isInteger(r)%3Fr%3Anull%3Blet%20e%3Dr.trim().match(%2FNo%5C.(%5Cd%2B)%2F)%3Bif(!e)return%20null%3Blet%20t%3DNumber.parseInt(e%5B1%5D%2C10)%3Breturn%20Number.isNaN(t)%3Fnull%3At%7Dfunction%20Ce(r)%7Blet%20e%3Dr.element.querySelector(%22.res_no%22)%3F.textContent%3F.trim()%2Ct%3De%3FNumber.parseInt(e%2C10)%3ANaN%3Bif(!Number.isNaN(t))return%20t%3Bif(r.allNodes)%7Bfor(let%20n%20of%20r.allNodes)if(n%20instanceof%20HTMLElement)%7Blet%20s%3Dn.querySelector(%22.res_no%22)%3Bif(s%3F.textContent)%7Blet%20i%3DNumber.parseInt(s.textContent.trim()%2C10)%3Bif(!Number.isNaN(i))return%20i%7D%7D%7Dreturn%20null%7Dfunction%20D(r)%7Breturn%7Bsuccess%3A!0%2Cvalue%3Ar%7D%7Dfunction%20E(r)%7Breturn%7Bsuccess%3A!1%2Cerror%3Ar%7D%7Dfunction%20P(r)%7Breturn%7Bsuccess%3A!1%2Cerror%3Ar%7D%7Dfunction%20ee(r)%7Breturn%7Bsuccess%3A!0%2Cvalue%3Ar%7D%7Dfunction%20te(r)%7Breturn%20Number.isFinite(r)%3Fr%3C%3D0%3FP(%7Bcode%3A%22SPEED_MULTIPLIER_NON_POSITIVE%22%2Cmessage%3A%22%E5%86%8D%E7%94%9F%E9%80%9F%E5%BA%A6%E3%81%AF0%E3%82%88%E3%82%8A%E5%A4%A7%E3%81%8D%E3%81%84%E6%95%B0%E5%80%A4%E3%81%A7%E6%8C%87%E5%AE%9A%E3%81%97%E3%81%A6%E3%81%8F%E3%81%A0%E3%81%95%E3%81%84%E3%80%82%22%2Cinput%3Ar%7D)%3Aee(r)%3AP(%7Bcode%3A%22SPEED_MULTIPLIER_NOT_FINITE%22%2Cmessage%3A%22%E5%86%8D%E7%94%9F%E9%80%9F%E5%BA%A6%E3%81%AF%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E3%81%AE%E6%95%B0%E5%80%A4%E3%81%A7%E6%8C%87%E5%AE%9A%E3%81%97%E3%81%A6%E3%81%8F%E3%81%A0%E3%81%95%E3%81%84%E3%80%82%22%2Cinput%3Ar%7D)%7Dfunction%20ne(r)%7Blet%20e%3Dr.trim()%3Btry%7Blet%20t%3Dnew%20URL(e)%3Breturn%20t.protocol!%3D%3D%22http%3A%22%26%26t.pr ()%3D%3Ethis.handleDragEnd()%2Cwindow.addEventListener(%22touchmove%22%2Cthis.boundMove%2C%7Bpassive%3A!1%7D)%2Cwindow.addEventListener(%22touchend%22%2Cthis.boundEnd)%2Cwindow.addEventListener(%22touchcancel%22%2Cthis.boundEnd)%2Cwindow.addEventListener(%22mousemove%22%2Cthis.boundMove)%2Cwindow.addEventListener(%22mouseup%22%2Cthis.boundEnd)%7DdetachDragListeners()%7Bthis.boundMove%26%26(window.removeEventListener(%22touchmove%22%2Cthis.boundMove)%2Cwindow.removeEventListener(%22mousemove%22%2Cthis.boundMove)%2Cthis.boundMove%3Dnull)%2Cthis.boundEnd%26%26(window.removeEventListener(%22touchend%22%2Cthis.boundEnd)%2Cwindow.removeEventListener(%22touchcancel%22%2Cthis.boundEnd)%2Cwindow.removeEventListener(%22mouseup%22%2Cthis.boundEnd)%2Cthis.boundEnd%3Dnull)%7DschedulePositionApply()%7Bthis.positionFrame%3D%3D%3Dnull%26%26(this.positionFrame%3Dwindow.requestAnimationFrame(()%3D%3E%7Bthis.positionFrame%3Dnull%2Cthis.applyPosition()%7D))%7DapplyPosition()%7Bif(!this.container)return%3Blet%20e%3Dthis.dragWidth%7C%7Cthis.container.getBoundingClientRect().width%7C%7C48%2Ct%3Dthis.dragHeight%7C%7Cthis.container.getBoundingClientRect().height%7C%7C48%2Cn%3Dwindow.innerWidth-e-12%2Cs%3Dwindow.innerHeight-t-12%3Bif(!this.position)this.position%3D%7Bx%3AMath.max(12%2Cn)%2Cy%3AMath.max(12%2Cs)%7D%3Belse%7Blet%20i%3DMath.max(12%2Cwindow.innerWidth-e-12)%2Ca%3DMath.max(12%2Cwindow.innerHeight-t-12)%3Bthis.position.x%3DMath.min(Math.max(12%2Cthis.position.x)%2Ci)%2Cthis.position.y%3DMath.min(Math.max(12%2Cthis.position.y)%2Ca)%7Dthis.container.style.left%3D%60%24%7Bthis.position.x%7Dpx%60%2Cthis.container.style.top%3D%60%24%7Bthis.position.y%7Dpx%60%7DformatDate(e)%7Blet%20t%3De.getFullYear().toString().padStart(4%2C%220%22)%2Cn%3D(e.getMonth()%2B1).toString().padStart(2%2C%220%22)%2Cs%3De.getDate().toString().padStart(2%2C%220%22)%2Ci%3De.getHours().toString().padStart(2%2C%220%22)%2Ca%3De.getMinutes().toString().padStart(2%2C%220%22)%2Co%3De.getSeconds().toString().padStart(2
